install.p1: If you are using the app already, it is likely that you already have it installed on your GNU/Linux system.  If you somehow do not have it already installed, use the following steps.
install.p2: 1. Download the lrc.deb package onto you GNU/Linux system.
install.p4: 3. Move the /opt/lrc-client directory to your device.
install.p6: 5. Open index.html in your-device-directory/lrc-client in a browser, add your server, and have fun.
